```{r setup, cachedChunk, cache = TRUE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

ny_noaa = read_csv("../data/nynoaadat.zip") %>%
  clean_names %>%
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month","day"), sep = "-")

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Figure 1: General Trend of Precipitation

```{r, cachedChunk, cache = TRUE}
ny_noaa %>%
  select("year", "prcp") %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  filter(prcp < 3000) %>%
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~prcp, color = ~year, type = "box", colors = "Set2") 
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r, cache = TRUE}
ny_noaa %>%
  select(year, month, day, prcp) %>%
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>%
  group_by(month, day) %>%
  plot_ly(y= ~mean(prcp), x = ~month, color = ~year, type = "scatter")




```
